com.github.kskelm.baringo

Class GalleryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kskelm.baringo.GalleryService

  • public class GalleryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to the viral/top/best galleries.

    See Imgur documentation.

    Author:
    Kevin Kelm (triggur@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • listGallery

        public java.util.List<GalleryItem> listGallery(GalleryItem.Section section,
                                               GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                               GalleryItem.Window window,
                                               boolean viral,
                                               int page)
                                        throws BaringoApiException
        This returns a list of items in a gallery.

        It returns a list of abstract class GalleryItem, each of which may actually be a GalleryAlbum or a GalleryImage. Imgur API 3 is a little unfriendly to statically typed languages.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        section - the section of the gallery. May be one of - Hot | Top | User
        sort - the sort for the results. May be one - Viral | Time | Top
        window - the window of time when the section is Top
        viral - whether or not viral images are to be returned
        page - the page number to return, starting at 0
        Returns:
        A list of GalleryItem objects
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something went sideways

      • listMemeGallery

        public java.util.List<GalleryItem> listMemeGallery(GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                                   GalleryItem.Window window,
                                                   int page)
                                            throws BaringoApiException
        Exactly like getGallery() except this returns items from the meme gallery.

        Though the Imgur 3 API seems to support including text info in the meme metadata, it does not actually come back from the server for some reason.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        sort - the sort direction - Viral | Time | Top
        window - thetime range when the sort is Top
        page - the page number to return, starting at 0
        Returns:
        a list of gallery items
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something bad

      • listSubredditGallery

        public java.util.List<GalleryItem> listSubredditGallery(java.lang.String subreddit,
                                                        GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                                        GalleryItem.Window window,
                                                        int page)
                                                 throws BaringoApiException
        Exactly like getGallery() except this returns items from the subreddit galleries.

        Though the Imgur 3 API seems to support including text info in the meme metadata, it does not actually come back from the server for some reason.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        subreddit - the name of the subreddit in question
        sort - the sort direction - Time | Top
        window - the time range when the sort is Top
        page - the page number to return, starting at 0
        Returns:
        a list of gallery items
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something bad

      • getTagGallery

        public TagGallery getTagGallery(java.lang.String tag,
                                GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                GalleryItem.Window window,
                                int page)
                         throws BaringoApiException
        Returns a TagGallery object representing gallery information for the results of a specific tag.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        tag - the tag for which we want to list a gallery
        sort - the mechanism for sorting - Viral | Time | Top
        window - the time window to fetch when the sort is Top
        page - the page number, starting at 0
        Returns:
        A TagGallery object with info about the galler, including a list of results, if any
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something bad

      • getImageInfo

        public Image getImageInfo(java.lang.String id)
                   throws BaringoApiException
        Given an image id, return info about the Image object for it. This just points to ImageService.getImageInfo()

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the image, for example "PgZtz0j". If a user is logged in and this image is theirs, the deleteHash property will be filled in. It will otherwise be null
        Returns:
        Image object
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something went pear-shaped

      • voteGalleryItemTag

        public java.lang.Boolean voteGalleryItemTag(java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String tag,
                                            Vote vote)
                                     throws BaringoApiException
        Given an item id and a tag name, vote it either up or down. The tag is implicitly created if it doesn't already exist.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the item to vote on
        tag - the tag to vote up or down
        vote - the vote, Up or Down
        Returns:
        true if it worked
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - nope

                                                 GalleryItem.Sort sort,
                                                 GalleryItem.Window window,
                                                 int page)
                                          throws BaringoApiException
        Performs a gallery search, returning GalleryItems that fits the SearchQuery criteria.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        query - the search query to perform
        sort - the method of sorting - Viral | Time | Top
        window - the time range to return when the sort is Top
        page - the page number to return, starting at 0
        Returns:
        a list of GalleryItem objects
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - badness

      • getRandomGallery

        public java.util.List<GalleryItem> getRandomGallery(int page)
                                             throws BaringoApiException
        This returns a list of random gallery items. Imgur refreshes this random list once per hour.

        ACCESS: ANONYMOUS

        Parameters:
        page - the page number to return, starting at 0
        Returns:
        A list of GalleryItem objects
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - something went sideways

      • shareItem

        public boolean shareItem(java.lang.String itemId,
                         java.lang.String title,
                         int topicId,
                         boolean agreedToTerms,
                         boolean nsfw)
                  throws BaringoApiException
        Shares the given item (image or album) with the gallery community.

        IMPORTANT: YOU CAN SHARE AN ITEM AT MOST ONCE EVERY 60 MINUTES FROM THE SAME USER! The throttling is strong with this one.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        itemId - id of the item to share
        title - title of the post
        topicId - numeric id of the topic to post to, or 0 if none. see TopicService.listDefaultTopics() for how to get those
        agreedToTerms - whether or not the user agreed to the terms. Apparently Imgur doesn't mind if you lie.
        nsfw - True if this item should be marked as "mature"
        Returns:
        true if it worked
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - it didn't

      • unshareItem

        public boolean unshareItem(java.lang.String itemId)
                    throws BaringoApiException
        Removes the given item (image or album) from the public gallery. The currently-logged-in user must be the owner of the item.

        ACCESS: AUTHENTICATED USER

        Parameters:
        itemId - the id of the item to remove
        Returns:
        true if it worked
        Throws:
        BaringoApiException - it didn't
